Colored pages

Colored pages are hot. Colored Pages are simple. Colored pages are fun. They come with predefined utility classes and support your very own custom css. They like what you like.

There are still some aspects of this module waiting to be finished. Luckily, you can already use the latest version published on NPM. In the meantime you can check the project on GITHUB and play around with this demo page.
